message:
Dear Alertistas,

We're going to try out a new feature...

Rather than sending them out one at a time, we're going to compile the last dozen, or so, FALSE FLAG ALERTS (lifted from our Twitter feed, in case you're interested) listed by: Most recent first.

And we'll include a couple month's worth, or so, so that you can see for yourself how *they* keep recycling the same tired propaganda over & over...

-- Kim M.

____________________________________________


FALSE FLAG ALERT Digest: February 18, 2011

NORAD to conduct exercises Thursday over Montreal
http://bit.ly/gcSHs3
